title: Archive through August 29, 2004
content:
Hi all,   
I found this nice looking avante typeface, with a twist   
anyone know what its called? Any help is much appreciated..   
 ![Typeface](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017090622im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/47317.jpg)
author: DagBrandsaeter

comments.content: more modified Helvetica... the numerals are very cool tho
